alert.note: Alert for Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 9:38PM PST until March 01 at 3:35AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wilson River near Tillamook. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 12.0 feet, minor flooding of low lying dairy and pasture land north and east of Tillamook can be expected, particularly during high tides. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM PST Monday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 5.6 feet Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM PST.
